A6.text: There are eleven surviving manuscripts of Leonardo da Vinci's notes and drawings, amounting to thousands of pages in total.

A7.text: The small number of surviving paintings is due in part to Leonardo's habit of disastrous experimentation with new techniques and his chronic procrastination, resulting in many incomplete works.

A8.text: The Codex Arundel on the British Library's Digitised Manuscripts Website
